website_summaries.verdict: If you like an on-ear fit and big bass response for your workouts, the wireless Plantronics BackBeat Fit 500 headphones get just about everything right.
pros: Powerful bass response matched with bright highs
cons: No inline remote on the included cable

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and stay on
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading some reviews that they woulld be too tight, but they fit perfectly. They stay on my head while I'm working out, jogging weight lifting etc. After 3 or 4 hours hours my outer ear hurts a little bit but there has to be some tension for the headphones to stay on and I don't usually wear them that long anyway. Battery life seems around the 10 hour mark to me, but maybe a couple more. All in all the best workout headphones I have ever used and my first on ear headphones for working out, I'll never go back to in ear!
customer_reviews.author: booth_1@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Not headphone for doing any sort of sport
customer_reviews.text: Worst fitting headphones I've ever used. I do not by any means expect these to sit securely on my head for running. I only ever have used them whilst weight lifting. They slide off your head while lying flat on a bench with out even moving. Sound qaulity is poor. Can have a conversation with someone whilst full volume. The gyms music is louder in my ears than these headphones. Not at all happy with choosing these.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Du Plessis

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases
customer_reviews.text: My old headphones had gave out on me and i needed to find new headphones and then I stumbled upon this. I needed a good headphone for the gym and casual use. I have never had headphones that have fit me so well, whenever I go jogging it doesn't come off and no matter how quickly I move the earphones stay put. Also the bass of these headphones are amazing and with it being such a low priced product it makes it an easy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Price, Sound, Features and good looks make these phones a winner!
customer_reviews.text: For the money - and for people like me who love running/training - but HATE in ear headphones - these are the best you can get. The Monster iSport Freedom headphones are stupendously overpriced, in fact you can buy two of these headphones and still have money left over compared to the Monsters. The sound is very good considering the price and the anti sweat/water feature works great. The controls are simple and work every time. Thanks Plantronics, you did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lodge

customer_reviews.title: perfectly good light (ish) headphone - ok comfort for an hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use in the gym, perfectly good light (ish) headphone - ok comfort for an hours work out. The sound quality is not going to rock your world, but they are absolutely fine for the gym. Bluetooth with my Samsung phone has been rock solid and I charge them up at most once a week. It would be 5 stars if the audio quality went up a notch, but thats unrealistic at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Duke916

customer_reviews.title: save your money and spend on something else
customer_reviews.text: charging fault. Headset was fully charged when I took these out of the box, however now that they need charging, they wont. The red light comes on, and even after a full night being on charged they do not register as having a full charge. I high recommend not purchasing these, and to look else where. Total waste of my time and money...not happy at all. Plantronics you really need to address this issue, and not continue to sell faulty headphones, especially as it wood appear there have been other customers complaining of this issue. Remove the batches that contain the faulty batteries and show some respect for your customers
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These headphones fit snugly and stay on in the gym and don’t jump up and down or cut out when you run. They are sweat resistant and the sound quality is good for the gym. I also have the Sense headphones which I prefer but those aren’t waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: B233

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with a lot of bass, attractive design, lightweight, tight on the head but comfortable with pretty good battery life. I think it's overall the best headset you can get for that kind of money. And that's coming from a guy who has at least 4 2-hour gym sessions a week combined with running and cycling so the headset has seen some action :) Plantronics team, well done, you just got another fan!
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Restless Headpphones
customer_reviews.text: The overriding problem with this product is that it doesn’t stay on the top of my head during either a cardio or weight based workout. Constantly sliding about and slipping off my head has become infuriating beyond belief. The sound quality is quite good as well which makes it a shame. I had some wrap around Plantronics and they were fantastic so This is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have great sound quality, they fit firmly on the ears and head. After a one hour run, I still couldn't feel any uncomfortable pressure, but it covers the ears so prepare to hear step noise and some wind. I really like the option to use it as wired headphones with provided cable, but the microphone is only available in bluetooth mode. It can handle up to five connected devices. No connection issues so far, I'm really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Antal Orcsik (Tony)

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery but defective after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: Headphones can tend to slip off during workout. Sound quality is great and so too is the battery life. However, the headphones go through a cycle of switching on and off by themselves despite them being switched off with the button, for £60 I expected them to last longer without a defect. Added video of the cycling without me actually physically touching the power switch or any Bluetooth being connected.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Gasperan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, my only complaint would be that charging the product has its issues as there was only a micro USB cable given and not all plugs or outlets charge the headset correctly. Battery life, Bluetooth connection and sound are all excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last December and i have been using them for barley 3 months, they were fine but unfortunately the the top of the headphones the plastic bit seems to have bowed over time and now its broken and cannot sit on mt head. very very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kaladin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty/broken after only a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth/power button had gone faulty after a few months use. Wouldn't connect via bluetooth after that.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for people with smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these headphones, because I'm not really a fan of in-ear earphones. While the sound is pretty good, these headphones are not for people with bigger heads as for some reason these headphone don't extend much and this causes discomfort on ears. If you have glasses then it's even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Rasmus Aer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with these headphones. I bought them for use at the gym. They connect to my phone really easily, and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Miss V. Bowskill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ran a few miles in these headphones, also did a few workouts, and so far, the best headphones I have used when it comes to sweatproof. Cool design, clear sound. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marek BARAN

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to pair, good quality and work really well at the gym, only issue is there are not hugely loud, but excellent headphones
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fab little find.
customer_reviews.text: Got these little beauties for when I’m on the treadmill at the gym. They’re great. I happily jog away whilst watching my Netflix. Sound is great and they don’t move about on your head or anything. Can accept calls and everything on them. Great little buy.
customer_reviews.author: Blaise802001

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best headphones at this price.
customer_reviews.text: What I really like is comfortance. Usually you have to accept that after 30min wearing you will notice some pain-like feeling, but with this product no such issue.
customer_reviews.author: Key Aavoja

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones for over the head for exercise Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great pair!
customer_reviews.text: Sweat resistance is a must if you are you are planning to use them it the gym, lightweight, good sounding (nice soundstage) just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Damir A.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great all round sound but can get a little sweaty during a workout
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones for running and gym only bad point is the mic for calls is not great.
customer_reviews.author: darren dale

customer_reviews.title: Great workout headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gym headphones. Loud and good sound quality, plus they never slip off. Battery lasts for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My product didn’t arrive on time, but was as described.
customer_reviews.author: lisa russell

customer_reviews.title: Really liked them, but
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a mission to find headphones for walking the dog in and have tried (and returned) several pairs before these. Don't need or want noise cancelling, don't want in-ear, just want a decent sound, and comfort. These were so nearly right, but unfortunately they're just not quite long enough for me: at full extension, they didn't quite sit on the right place on the ear. I really liked everything else about them...but just not not quite big enough, and I can't move my ears, so back they (the headphones) went. I think if your ears are a bit higher up your hear (than mine are) I'd fully recommend the Plantronics, but, for me, the search goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: got them for my boyfriend as present and he loves them! they are very comfy and apparently good sound quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym - battery lasts ages, sound is great, good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Echoing the comments of the previous reviewer - I use these for the gym rather than taking calls. Have been using them since Christmas, and they are still on their first charge (!) - I have been using them 2-3 times per week for an hour at a time, so the battery life is excellent. Range is also excellent - I can wander around the gym, easily 30 feet, connection stays strong. Sound quality excellent, easy to wipe down when sweaty. Two other recommendations if you work out a lot: 1. A robust bag to store these in, medium size in this set  2. A cedar deodoriser to keep everything smelling sweet, including the case and headphones inside
customer_reviews.author: SteveMK

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound, perfect compact size with foldable earpieces. Great value for money. Better than I expected all round!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

product_meta.title: Plantronics 210701-99 Backbeat Fit 500 Headset - Teal
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Teal

Go wireless with the BackBeat FIT 500 Series headphones, featuring up to 18 hours of deep, rich sound on a single charge. With sweat-resistant Nano-coating technology by P2i and its lightweight, cushioned design, you’ll enjoy all-day comfort from the locker room to the lecture hall, and everywhere in between. The BackBeat FIT 500 Series — experience wireless.

Whether you're warming up or winding down, move freely with BackBeat FIT 500 Series wireless sport headphones. Enjoy deep, rich sound, sweat-resistant nano-coating by P2i and a lightweight design for comfortable wearing all day.

From the locker room to the lecture hall, you’re always on the move. Listen for up to 18 hours on a single charge, then use DeepSleep mode to conserve power when your headphones aren’t in use. Can’t find a place to recharge? Listen uninterrupted with the 3.5 mm backup jack.

Constantly on the move? P2i military-grade nano-coating protects the headphones against sweat, moisture and spills, so they’re durable enough to withstand rainy commutes and gym sessions.

Don't just hear your favorite tracks, feel them. 40 mm drivers and advanced acoustic technology deliver audio balance and deep, rich sound — whether you’re hitting the weights or the books.



BOX CONTAINS
BACKBEAT FIT 505 Headset
Micro-USB Charging Cable
3.5mm Audio Cable
User Guide
feature_bullets: Up to 18 hours of wireless listening and talk time on a single charge
Comfortable memory foam ear cups help isolate sound
Sweat-resistant protection from P2i military-grade Nano-coating
Stream up to 33 ft./10 m from Bluetooth-compatible devices
40 mm drivers and advanced acoustic technology provide premium audio

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
